Watch out! We've got lots of new features for you

General bug fixes and performance improvements!

￭ 3D Birthday card is now available on PhotoGrid! Surprise your family and friends with a whole new digital pop up card effect!
￭ Now you can easily open the video editor on the home page; create your video story now!
￭ Performance improvements

• My Collages: History feature is coming! All photo and video collages you’ve made can be recorded and saved, so you can quickly go back to them and make new changes!
• Aspect Ratio: Ratio can be easily seen and freely changed when you edit photos as y

• My Collages: History feature is coming! All photo and video collages you’ve made can be recorded and saved, so you can quickly go back to them and make new changes!

【Added New Ratio】New ratio for 1:2 and 2:1
【Added Blur function】You can use “Blur” in Edit page

【Added “Adjust” in edit page】New edit tool – Brightness , Contrast , Saturation , Hue , Vignette
【Improved】Improved the effect of “Face pop effect” ,you will see clearer result after pop effect and more natural edge processing

【Added "Adjust" function in "Grid", "Scrapbook", "Filmstrip"】New edit tool – Brightness , Contrast , Saturation , Hue , Vignette
【Added ''image" function in editing page】You can add your favorite photo as a sticker, or add a PNG file as a watermark or

[Fixed album order error issue]
We found that pictures downloaded from the Internet have the problem caused. Now, our engineers had repaired it. When choosing the photo in PhotoGrid -Albums, your photo will be Sort by right time !

-Fixed album photo repeated appear issue
-New live stickers is online now, this time we have Hotel Transylvania 3 in PhotoGrid, come and try it out!

[Slide Show ]
Now you can minimize per photo time to 0.5 Sec!
